column4: Oh I forgot, I also use Xandros  lol 7 versions of debian based distros
I wish Ubuntu had a kde version
NOt on Warty u couldnt...said right in ubuntu documentation that gnome is built into the kernel
please don't spread FUD like that
whatever article you're talking about is wrong
please contact the author and correct them
sorry, you seem to be mis-interpreting the article
kde is not installed by default, but it's certainly available
also, I'm not sure where you got the "gnome is built into the kernel" idea from
synaptic is fine, and installed by default and doesn't pull in megs of KDE libraries.
